---
title: "Faculty Interview Protocol"
author: "Allison Theobold, Stacey Hancock, Sara Mannheimer"
date: "May 1, 2020"
output:
  pdf_document: default
  html_document: default
---

- What computational understandings and/or abilities do you believe are 
necessary for practitioners in your field?  

- What computational understandings and/or abilities do you expect that masters
or doctoral graduates of your program will have? 

- Of the courses required for completion of a masters or doctoral degree, which,
if any, specifically teach computing?  

- To the best of your understanding, what computational concepts and/or skills
are taught in each of these courses?  

- For the methods that are necessary for coursework and research that are not
specifically taught, where do you believe students are acquiring these skills?  

- What resources do you recommend to students who require support in building
and applying computational skills?
